segments.text: Sandy . Do you have a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , John . I ’ m on my break . What ’ s going on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not much . I just wanted to see how you were . How ’ s married life treating you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , except for my mother-in-law ! Sometimes I think I married her instead of my husband ! How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2
